children.text: AFC Cup - Bengaluru FC Vs Abahani Limited Dhaka (BAN)
Kanteerava Outdoor Stadium, Kasturba Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

The history men at Bengaluru FC begin their continental campaign with the AFC Cup at the Sree Kanteerava Stadium in Bengaluru. Last year's finalists will look to go one better this time out as the group stages get underway. Grab your tickets, flood the fortress, and catch the Blues in action!
